item.title: Landmark Cars Ltd Hits Intraday High with 8.08% Surge on 1 Feb 2026
item.description: Landmark Cars Ltd demonstrated a robust intraday performance on 1 Feb 2026, surging to a day’s high of Rs 422.1, marking an 8.99% increase from its previous close. This sharp uptick outpaced the broader sector and the Sensex, reflecting notable trading momentum in the automobile stock. Time: 10 minutes ago

item.title: Bank Of Baroda Hits Intraday Low Amid Price Pressure on 1 Feb 2026

item.title: ACC Ltd Falls 1.97% Amid Profit Pressures: 3 Key Factors Shaping the Week
item.description: ACC Ltd’s share price declined by 1.97% over the week ending 30 January 2026, closing at Rs.1,637.50 compared to Rs.1,670.35 the previous Friday. This underperformance contrasted with the Sensex’s 1.62% gain during the same period, reflecting investor concerns following a sharp quarterly profit contraction and the stock hitting a fresh 52-week low. Despite record revenue growth, margin pressures and operational challenges weighed heavily on the company’s financials and market sentiment. Time: 11 minutes ago

item.title: Vaghani Techno-Build Ltd Gains 5.75%: 6 Key Factors Driving the Rally
item.description: Vaghani Techno-Build Ltd delivered a strong weekly performance, rising 5.75% from Rs.228.85 to Rs.242.00 between 27 and 30 January 2026, significantly outperforming the Sensex’s 1.62% gain over the same period. The stock hit multiple new 52-week and all-time highs during the week, supported by sustained technical momentum and consistent buying interest despite a cautious broader market environment. Time: 11 minutes ago

item.title: Persistent Systems Declines 1.85% Amid Rising Open Interest and Put Option Activity
item.description: Persistent Systems Ltd experienced a challenging week ending 30 January 2026, with its share price falling 1.85% from Rs.6,147.50 to Rs.6,033.80, underperforming the Sensex which rose 1.62% over the same period. Despite robust fundamentals and a strong mojo score, the stock faced short-term pressure driven by increased open interest in derivatives and heavy put option activity signalling cautious investor sentiment. Time: 11 minutes ago

item.title: Balaji Amines Ltd’s Volatile Week: -1.08% Amid Mixed Technical Signals and Sector Headwinds
item.description: Balaji Amines Ltd experienced a turbulent week ending 30 January 2026, with its share price declining 1.08% to close at Rs.1,117.75, underperforming the Sensex which gained 1.62% over the same period. The stock showed sharp intraday swings, including a strong rally on 28 January followed by steep declines on 29 and 30 January, reflecting mixed technical signals and ongoing sector challenges. Time: 11 minutes ago

item.title: Ion Exchange Gains 1.49%: Key Events and Market Pressures Shape Weekly Performance
item.description: Ion Exchange (India) Ltd closed the week ending 30 January 2026 with a modest gain of 1.49%, rising from Rs.349.45 to Rs.354.65. This performance, however, lagged slightly behind the Sensex’s 1.62% advance over the same period. The week was marked by a mix of positive rating upgrades and sharp price declines, culminating in a volatile finish with the stock hitting a new 52-week low amid significant selling pressure. Time: 11 minutes ago

item.title: United Foodbrands Ltd Surges to Upper Circuit Amid Robust Buying Pressure
